DOC.brief_summary: Safety Feasibility Combined Trigeminal Occipital Transcutaneous Nerve Stimulation ( CTO-TNS ) Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.brief_title: Safety Feasibility Combined Trigeminal Occipital Transcutaneous Nerve Stimulation ( CTO-TNS ) Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.criteria: The subject capable understanding study sign inform consent . Subject age 18 65 year old . Unipolar major depressive disorder Score Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HDRS21 ) > 22 Current MDD episode > 3 month Nonresponse > 6 week use one six antidepressant current episode History neurosurgical intervention . Subjects metal implant shrapnel head , except dental implant . Skin lesion inflammation region stimulate electrode . Pregnancy Lactation . Women reproductive age use efficient contraceptive method . History cerebrovascular event . Psychotic bipolar depression History schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder nonmood disorder psychosis Current delirium , dementia , amnestic disorder cognitive disorder Clinically significant current suicidal intent assess investigator team . Obsessivecompulsive disorder posttraumatic stress disorder Alcohol nonalcohol psychoactive substance abuse dependence Significant cardiac , medical , progressive neurological medical illness An implantable electrical device pacemaker .
